author: A_Brickset_user
title: Sweet set as an extra to Flower Fairy Party (5862)
review:
Sweet little set as an extra to 5862. The major extras are the boat and the baby. As a stand alone set I think that the baseboard is a little too small for the set which is not a problem if you have other baseboards anyway or you could build up rather than out!
Dinky items such as cups and cakes to make little tea parties with which are popular
with my girls. I think Belville should come in little pink plastic boxes to keep all those
bits in.
